name: Hamburger
description: A classic American dish made with a beef patty, served on a bun with toppings such as lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese.

name: Hotdog
description: Another classic American food, made with a grilled sausage served in a long bun with toppings like ketchup, mustard, and relish.

name: Barbecue ribs
description: Slow-cooked pork ribs coated in barbecue sauce, often served with sides like coleslaw and baked beans.

name: Macaroni and cheese
description: A comfort food staple made with macaroni pasta and a cheesy sauce.

name: Fried chicken
description: Crispy, breaded chicken that has been deep-fried, often served with sides like mashed potatoes and gravy.
